00022 /**
00023  * @file   SummaryGenotypeEngine.h
00024  * @author Luis Jevons
00025  * @date   Wed April 17 16:01:09 2009
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Core routines for summary-genotype binaries. By separating the
00028  * command line parsing form the computation we allow a GUI application to share
00029  * the core computation once setting up the option class. 
00030  */
00031 #ifndef _SUMMARYGENOTYPEENGINE_H_
00032 #define _SUMMARYGENOTYPEENGINE_H_
00033

00038 #include <cstring>

00043 /**
00044  * Class to wrap up the complexity of the different possible input
00045  * files to SummaryGenotypeEngine
00046  */
00047 class SgIoHelper {
00048   
00049 public: 
00050   
00051   /** 
00052    * Constructor. Take a number of files and figure out which one(s) has
00053    * been set to read from.
00054    * 
00055    * @param summariesFile   Text summary file with results interleved.
00056    * @param summariesFileA  Text summary file for A alleles
00057    * @param summariesFileB  Text summary file for B alleles
00058    * @param file5           File5 version of the summary file above
00059    * @param file5Group      Which group the summary file5 is in with name "summaries"
00060    */
00061   SgIoHelper(const std::string &summariesFile,
00062            const std::string &summariesFileA, const std::string &summariesFileB,
00063            const std::string &file5,
00064            const std::string &file5Group);  
00065 
00066 
00067   /** Destructor */
00068   ~SgIoHelper();
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * Read in a single line from out summaries file and fill label and values.
00072    * 
00073    * @param label      Probesetname to be filled in
00074    * @param vals       Values to be filled in
00075    * @param summaries  File to read next row from
00076    * @param colNames   Names of the column in summaries file
00077    */
00078   void getLine(std::string &label, std::vector<double> &vals, 
00079                affx::TsvFile &summaries, std::vector<std::string> &colNames);
00080 
00081   /** 
00082    * Read in a single line from out summaries file5 and fill label and values.
00083    * 
00084    * @param label      Probesetname to be filled in
00085    * @param vals       Values to be filled in
00086    * @param summaries  File5 to read next row from
00087    * @param colNames   Names of the column in summaries file
00088    */
00089   void getFile5Line(std::string &label, std::vector<double> &vals, 
00090                     affx::File5_Tsv *summaries, std::vector<std::string> &colNames);
00091 
00092   /** 
00093    * Read the next snp marker from the single interleved file5 summary file
00094    *  
00095    * @param colNames Names of the columns in summary file.
00096    * @param aVals Summary values for the A allele
00097    * @param bVals Summary values for the B allele
00098    * @param probesetName Name of probeset
00099    * 
00100    * @return true if successful, false otherwise
00101    */
00102   bool getNextMarkerTsvSingle(std::vector<std::string> &colNames, std::vector<double> &aVals, 
00103                               std::vector<double> &bVals, std::string &probesetName);
00104 
00105   /** 
00106    * Read the next snp marker from the file5 
00107    *  
00108    * @param colNames Names of the columns in summary file.
00109    * @param aVals Summary values for the A allele
00110    * @param bVals Summary values for the B allele
00111    * @param probesetName Name of probeset
00112    * 
00113    * @return true if successful, false otherwise
00114    */
00115   bool getNextMarkerFile5(std::vector<std::string> &colNames, std::vector<double> &aVals, 
00116                           std::vector<double> &bVals, std::string &probesetName);
00117   /** 
00118    * Read the next snp marker from the paired summary A & B files
00119    *  
00120    * @param colNames Names of the columns in summary file.
00121    * @param aVals Summary values for the A allele
00122    * @param bVals Summary values for the B allele
00123    * @param probesetName Name of probeset
00124    * 
00125    * @return true if successful, false otherwise
00126    */
00127   bool getNextMarkerTwoTsv(std::vector<std::string> &colNames, std::vector<double> &aVals, 
00128                            std::vector<double> &bVals, std::string &probesetName);
00129   /** 
00130    * Read the next snp marker.
00131    *  
00132    * @param colNames Names of the columns in summary file.
00133    * @param aVals Summary values for the A allele
00134    * @param bVals Summary values for the B allele
00135    * @param probesetName Name of probeset
00136    * 
00137    * @return true if successful, false otherwise
00138    */
00139   bool getNextMarker(std::vector<std::string> &colNames, std::vector<double> &aVals, 
00140                      std::vector<double> &bVals, std::string &probesetName);
00141 
00142   /** 
00143    * Get the names of the columns in the summary files.
00144    * 
00145    * @return names in order of the columns
00146    */
00147   std::vector<std::string> getColNames() {
00148     return m_ColNames;
00149   }
00150 
00151 private:
00152   
00153   /// Column names from the summary files not including the probeset_id column
00154   std::vector<std::string> m_ColNames;
00155   /// All the summaries as a single interleved TSV file
00156   affx::TsvFile summaries;
00157   /// All the A allele summaries as a TSV File
00158   affx::TsvFile summariesA;
00159   /// All the B allele summaries as a TSV File
00160   affx::TsvFile summariesB;
00161   /// Summaries in a file5 format
00162   affx::File5_File f5Summaries;
00163   /// Within the file5 format, the group that the intensities are in.
00164   affx::File5_Group *f5SumGroup;
00165   /// The tsv file within the File5 that contains the "summaries"
00166   affx::File5_Tsv *f5SumTsv;
00167 };

00169 class SummaryGenotypeEngine : public BaseEngine {
00170 
00171 public:
00172 
00173   virtual std::string getEngineName() { return SummaryGenotypeEngine::EngineName(); }
00174   static const std::string EngineName() { return "SummaryGenotypeEngine"; }
00175 
00176   /**
00177    * Constructor
00178    */
00179   SummaryGenotypeEngine();
00180 
00181   /**
00182    * Destructor
00183    */
00184   ~SummaryGenotypeEngine();
00185 
00186   /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00187   class Reg : public EngineReg
00188   {
00189   public:
00190     /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00191     Reg() : EngineReg(SummaryGenotypeEngine::EngineName())
00192     {
00193     }
00194 
00195     /*! Creates an object.
00196      * @return The object.
00197      */
00198     BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new SummaryGenotypeEngine; }
00199   };
00200 
00201   /*! The one and only registration object. */
00202   static Reg reg;
00203 
00204   /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00205    * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00206    * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00207    */
00208   static SummaryGenotypeEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
